mapper.select:
select ANO.AODESC as title, ANO.AOEDTE AS dateBegin, ANO.AOMSG AS content from PMTANO ANO LEFT JOIN PMTANOCUST ANOC ON ANO.AOREF = ANOC.AOREF
where ANO.AOEDTE < NOW() AND ANO.AOXDTE > NOW()
AND ((ANO.AOCUST = '[ALL]' OR ANO.AOCUST=#{customer}) OR (ANO.AOCOMP=#{company} AND (ANOC.AOCOMP IS NULL OR ANOC.AOCOMP=#{company}) AND (ANOC.AOCUST IS NULL OR ANOC.AOCUST=#{customer})))
AND ANO.AOLANG=#{referLanguage} ORDER BY ANO.AOEDTE DESC
